description:
Designed for the all-round ski tourer seeking the ideal balance of efficient climbing and reliable handling on the downhill. Cross Lace 2.0 integrates a cable through the buckle for a better overall fit and the ability to personalize the closure settings. The Backland Expert offers a softer flex with the best of the Backland innovations to create a boot with zero compromises.

  • Shell and cuff are made of light and stiff glass fibre loaded polyurethane
  • Prolite construction in the shell and cuff provides support and power transmission
  • 3D Gold Tour liner with Dry Fit Foam is thermo-mouldable, hand washable and fast drying
  • Free/Lock 4.0 ski/walk mechanism gives you 74° range of motion for climbing and 13-17° of forward lean for skiing
  • 98mm last has a somewhat narrow fit
  • 2 aluminum buckles and a 30mm super light strap
  • Perforated construction with waterproof breathable membrane keeps feet warm and dry
  • Frictionless pivot uses polymer bushings to provide natural movement on ascents
  • Cross Lace 2.0 closure system wraps and holds your foot securely
  • Rockered rubber sole allows for nearly normal walking
name: Atomic Backland Expert Ski Boots - Unisex
